li.label: brony
li.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has taken the lessons of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic to heart; {PAWN_possessive} social skills have improved, but {PAWN_pronoun} is against the idea of using violence.

{PAWN_pronoun} will never judge others based on their appearance, voice or breathing, and insults have no effect on {PAWN_objective} whatsoever.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus from equipping pony plushies, and has a positive attitude towards other bronies.

li.label: anti brony
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can't understand why any sane adult would enjoy My Little Pony, and tends to dislike anyone who does.\n\n{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss from equipping pony plushies.
